primCategory.name: CALDimPrim
primCategory.overview: Fundamental dimensions of solids and offsets for the Calorimeter
primCategory.prim: Transverse dimension of CAL Stay Clear envelope from LAT-DS-00038-2
Z-dimension of CAL Stay Clear envelope from LAT-DS-00038-2
Depletion depth of diode Si
Width of large diode Si
Width of small diode Si
Height of diode Si
Length of a CsI crystal as of 30May02
(Transverse) width of a CsI crytal. Changed from 26.714mm on 18 June, 2003.
Height of a CsI crystal
Z offset of diodes relative to crystal. Changed from .9 mm 18 June, 2003.
Y (transverse) offset of large diode relative to crystal. Changed from -2.55 mm on 18 June, 2003
Y offset of small diode relative to crystal. Changed from 8.6 mm on 18 June, 2003.
Vertical pitch of CsI and cells
Horizontal pitch of CsI and cells. Changed from 27.844 mm on 18 June, 2003.
Thickness of crystal wrap (reflector VM2000), as of 18 June, 2003.
Thickness of composite cell vertical walls (C) [only. Before 18 June, 2003, also includedreflector]
Thickness of composite cell horizontal walls (C)
Thickness of vertical cell wall for outermost cells in each layer. New constant, first defined 18 June, 2003
Thickness of horizontal cell wall above top layer. New constant, first defined 18 June 2003.
Thickness of horizontal cell wall below bottom layer. New constant, first defined 18 June 2003.
Horizontal thickness of side compartment with electronics. Changed from 11.6 mm as of 18 June, 2003.
Minimum gap between top of CAL (frame) and bottom of grid flange. 3 Sept. 2003
Horizontal thickness of inner wall within (largely hollow) side wall
Horizontal thickness of outer wall within (largely hollow) side wall. Changed from 1.0 mm as of 18 june, 2003.
Horizontal thickness of PCB within (largely hollow) side wall
Gap between CAL closeout and PCB layer of side wall
Horizontal, face-to-face dimension of CAL module (presumably both X and Y)
Vertical, top-to-bottom dimension of CAL module. Changed from 223.8 mm as of 18 June, 2003.
Diameter of cylindrical supports (Al)
Number of cells between adjacent (in the same layer) cylindrical supports
Thickness of CAL frame sides
Thickness of top of CAL frame (Al)
Thickness of bottom of CAL frame (Al) Changed 4 Sept. 2003 from 16.0 (ref: Sasha)
Width of top picture frame. Changed from 22 to 16.7 19 June 2003.(Al)
Width of bottom picture frame (Al)
Vertical thickness of CAL top plate composite. Changed from 2.0 mm as of 18 June, 2003.
Vertical thickness of CAL bottom plate composite. Changed from 4.0 mm as of 18 June, 2003.
Pitch of bottom plate ribs (Al)
Width of bottom plate ribs (Al)
Thickness of bottom plate ribs (Al)
Thickness of CAL mounting tabs, CAL to grid (Al)
Width of CAL mounting tabs
Transverse length of innermost components of CAL side wall, equal to gap between opposing closeout walls. Added as primary 24 June 2003
Frame width for upper of two top frame pieces. 19 June 2003
Frame width for lower of two top frame pieces. 19 June 2003
Frame height for lower of two top frame pieces. 19 June 2003
